metadata.title: CVE-2014-7906 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use-after-free vulnerability in the Pepper plugins in Google Chrome before39.0.2171.65 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service orpossibly have unspecified other impact via crafted Flash content thattriggers an attempted PepperMediaDeviceManager access outside of theobject's lifetime.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
